'''1.18.10.04''' is the first beta version of [[Education Edition 1.18.32]], released on February 24, 2022.<ref name=changelog>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220225222137/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4484636118420-What-s-New-in-the-Beta|title=What's New in the Beta|website=Minecraft Education Edition Support}}</ref> This update brought the [[Caves & Cliffs]]: Part II features to ''[[Education Edition]]''.
